EmailTemplate.description: PSA-IQVIAPSA-5798 - Relieve Secondary Author Assignment Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET33_PSA_Relieve Secondary Author Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Secondary Author Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Secondary Author listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Secondary Author is:{!Aggregate_Report__c.Secondary_Author__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You
